overview:
Roger is a media executive with leadership experience across content creation, business strategy, marketing and promotion. With more than 20 years in the television industry, he has spearheaded the dramatic growth of brand value in a variety of positions. Previous to joining TEAM, he worked for Discovery Communications as Executive Vice President and General Manager of The Learning Channel. During Roger’s tenure TLC became one of cable’s top networks.

Source: WineTastetv.com
